participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is hardworking and dedicated, often found with a smile on his face while tending to the fields. He has a strong connection to nature and enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is curious and insightful, always eager to learn new things. She loves sharing interesting facts and enjoys deep conversations about life and knowledge.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.
